index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City's Community Development Block Grant Program for the Grant Program Year January 1, 1984 through December 31, 1984, accepting financial assistance from the United States Department of Housing and Urban Development; appropriating funds received into the Housing and Community Development Revenue Sharing Fund; abandoning certain unexpended unencumbered balances in previous project appropriations; authorizing implementation of certain projects by the Department of Administrative Services, Department of Community Development, Department of Engineering, Department of Human Resources, Department of Parks and Recreation, Department of Public Health, and the Seattle Police Department; and ratifying and confirming prior act.
